qas.question: In what year did Mabel's father move to Washington D.C.?
In what year did Bell acquire a house in D.C.?
Where did Bell and Mabel live before 1880?
What did Bell have to go to court for in D.C.?

context: The Bell family home was in <a2_0>Cambridge, Massachusetts<a2_0/>, until <a0_0>1880<a0_0/> when Bell's father-in-law bought a house in Washington, D.C., and later in <a1_0>1882<a1_0/> bought a home in the same city for Bell's family, so that they could be with him while he attended to the numerous court cases involving <a3_0>patent disputes<a3_0/>.
